channel.title: Player Offline? [317] command help
channel.description:
Ok well basically, my command works perfectly fine if the player is online, does everything i want it to, only it's no use to me if the player is online as it's an ip ban command. I can't un ipban someone that's online, because obviously they're not going to be online...
I've tried [code] if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) { [/code]
That didn't work...
I also tried [code] if(Server.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i] == null) { [/code]
That didn't work either, so i'm wondering what would check if the player is offline?
If anyone could help me it'd be much appreciated.

item.title: Player Offline? [317] command help
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

Ok well basically, my command works perfectly fine if the player is online, does everything i want it to, only it’s no use to me if the player is online as it’s an ip ban command. I can’t un ipban someone that’s online, because obviously they’re not going to be online…

I’ve tried

if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) {

That didn’t work…

I also tried

That didn’t work either, so i’m wondering what would check if the player is offline?

If anyone could help me it’d be much appreciated.
